title: Enhanced Search Tools
requirement:
Incorporate advanced search functionality with filters for genre, mood, artist, album, and song title for accurate and fast results.  
#### Screens:  
* Advanced Search UI: Provide sections for applying multiple filters simultaneously.  
#### Personas:  
* Detail-Oriented User: Finds specific songs/albums efficiently using defined filters.  
* Browsing Listener: Uses mood or general filters to explore new music.
